channel.title: Project-Pentagon ll Daily Updates ll
channel.description:
[SIZE=4][CENTER]Today i am showing my new server to the people of rune-server.[/CENTER][/SIZE]
[SIZE=4][CENTER]Here is my website: [url=http://project-pentagon.weebly.com/]project-pentagon - Home[/url][/CENTER][/SIZE]
[CENTER]Here are the forums [url=http://project-pentagon.forumotion.com/]Project-Pentagon[/url][/CENTER]
[LEFT]Here are some of the feature we have.[/LEFT]
[SIZE=3][LEFT]We have working slayer.[/LEFT][/SIZE] [SIZE=3][LEFT]Working minigames.[/LEFT][/SIZE] [LEFT][SIZE=3]Custom zones, such as ::money, chaoticzone, etc.[/SIZE] [SIZE=3]Good shops.[/SIZE] We have daily updates. Donators have a good donator zone with items in shop. Really fun server. We have a auto join clan chat. We have a auto login system. We have working bosses(good drop rates) We have money pouch home is draynor Good xp rates We have working auto log out system. We need a staff team(no staff hunters please.) We are top 15 on rs-list. We have good pvm/pk. We have working sinister key chest, and crystal key chest. We have working mboxes. We have good skilling. Max combat is 138. We have fixed most dupes, glitches etc. We have added new shops.[/LEFT]
[CENTER]We have some media here, sorry i didnt set it up so you can see it, didn't have the time.
Media
Home
[IMG]http://prntscr.com/bhbz1h[/img]
Shops!
[IMG]http://prntscr.com/bhbz65[/img]
Chaoticzone!
[IMG]http://prntscr.com/bhbzbq[/img]
Money zone
[IMG]http://prntscr.com/bhbznu[/img]
Penguins!
[IMG]http://prntscr.com/bhbzu5][/img]]
Donator Store.
[IMG]http://prntscr.com/bhnkm9[/img]
Skilling store.
[IMG]http://prntscr.com/bhnl4y[/img]
Ranging store(Gonna be touched up on next update)
[IMG]http://prntscr.com/bhnlhk[/img]
Pure pking store(Gonna be touched up on next update)
[IMG]http://prntscr.com/bhnltc[/img]
Pking store(Gonna be touched up on next update)
[IMG]http://prntscr.com/bhnm9w[/img]
We have many more features just come online and see it, we're active 24/7 VPS Hosted. Thank you guys.[/CENTER]

@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

shadow9903:

Your website makes me slightly sad to look at.

It looks awful.
